Our Culture

We are a team of web developers collaborating to create a responsive and user-friendly web application to better inform novice buillion traders and collectors before they make a transaction. Through delegation, coordination, and cooperation we plan to stay on top of our schedule and finish our project in a timely manner. Our team is committed to combining our individual talents and strengths and working together to deliver a great application.
